ability.Intimidate: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opponents by 1 stage and sets up Tailwind, which doubles its Speed for 3 turns.
ability.Eclipse Guard: When HP is below half, reduces damage taken from Fairy-type moves by 50%.

Dragon Claw.effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

Brave Bird.effect: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target. Then, the user has a 20% chance to raise its Defense by 1 stage.

Lunar Strike.effect: Has a 15% chance to confuse the target.

Healing Roar.effect: Restores 50% of its max HP, but lowers its Special Defense by 1 stage.
